name: Leche Flan with Cream Cheese - Salu Salo Recipes
description: Indulge in a healthier version of the classic Filipino dessert with our Leche Flan with Cream Cheese recipe. Perfect for those who are mindful of their carbohydrate, sodium, and sugar intake, this low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar dessert is a part of our Healthified Recipes collection. It’s a delightful way to enjoy a traditional treat without compromising your dietary goals.
recipeIngredient: 1  container (385,00 g), Full cream condensed milk

recipeInstructions.text: Start by separating the yolks from the whites of 5 large eggs.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, blend the egg yolks, 1 tsp of vanilla extract, 4 fluid ounces of cream cheese, 370 ml of evaporated filled milk, and one container of full cream condensed milk until the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture into a caramel-lined flan mold.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the flan mold with aluminum foil and place in a larger baking pan half-filled with hot water (bain-marie technique).
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for about 1 hour or until set.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven and let cool before refrigerating. Chill for at least 4 hours before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
